Text.Page:
You've given us a good start. Thank you. We can take it from here, I think.

Why don't you head over to help out Kiron? He was about to head out to try to find Jadan's sonâ€”that's a job I'm sure he wouldn't mind a hand with.

Pemo sent you, eh? That was good of him.

Turns out I already found the kid, but I haven't thought of the right way to approach him yet.

Just...how do you say that? "Hey kid, we found your dad dead with his blood drained."

I think it needs more work.
